      • clickBinary

        public void clickBinary()
        Event for clicking the "Binary"-button. Displays the binary Image.

      • clickDespeckling

        public void clickDespeckling()
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Event for clicking the "Despeckling"-button. To remove noise from image or unnecessary contours that are probably not letters.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file is empty.

      • clickRectangle

        public void clickRectangle()
        Event for clicking the "Rectangle"-button. After selecting one of the three possibilities (exact, inside, touching,), contuors are recognized within the drawn rectangle and colored.

      • clickCreateRegion

        public void clickCreateRegion()
        Event for clicking the "Create"-button. Create regions of contained contours within a rectangle.

      • clickMerge

        public void clickMerge()
        Event for clicking the "Merge"-button. Provisionally Merge Methode, taking the first 2 Regions and merging them.

      • clickSplit

        public void clickSplit()
        Event for clicking the "Split"-button. divides regions in two half by a solid line.

      • clickClearRegions

        public void clickClearRegions()
        Event for clicking the "Clear Regions"-button. deletes all regions.
